task.summary: - infowindow on marker click - user name in navbar after login - reverted bootstrap-4
- File upload widget in create campaign.
- non-working resource links corrected in Advertisers - Hardware script initial commit
- Home page redirect disabled - Inventory id mismatch bug resolved
- Adevertiser/Hoarder console links added to navbar
- Login/Registration Validation, Redirection - Hoarder/Advertiser home page messages
- Admin menu items added in Navbar
- Add hoarding layout changed. - Global font size for Hoarder/Advertiser console
- New Admin Panel integration - Scripts for Hardware
- Redirect unauthenticated users to signin page - impression acknowledgement from hardware
- Campaign added in Hoarding serializer, Harware code modified accordingly - Hoarding last_update triggered in case of events related to Hoarding
- Advertiser UI improvement, hoarding image added to map
- Home page improvement - Google map cluster - Email smtp setting added
- Home page improvement - Google map cluster - Email smtp setting added
- plyr script, css added - homepage cover size changed
- Code for actual hoarding count on home page
